# isCoalescingUndo

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether undo coalescing is in progress.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isCoalescingUndo: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if undo coalescing is in progress, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Supporting undo

- **breakUndoCoalescing()**: Informs the receiver that it should begin coalescing successive typing operations in a new undo grouping.
